column1: ‘ Trouble Fish’, with its strutting Stray Cat bass riff, sees the student body collapsing on to their bums, feet airborne for the traditional anti - gravity dance bit : char hit ‘ Veronica’, where Niall gets to show off his ability on the mouth organ, sets every man - jack scruffy co - ed in the house moshing like fury, which they continue to do through the Tim Curry vocals of ‘ Teenage Vampire’ and the rollicking romps of ‘ Stupid Kid’, ‘ I Am I Said’and ‘ No More Nonsense From Sidney’.
